mapper.insert: insert into orders (order_num, order_date, image, id, pro_num, pro_info, pro_count, price) values(order_seq.nextval, sysdate, #{image}, #{id}, #{pro_num}, #{pro_info}, #{pro_count}, #{price})
mapper.update: update orders set pro_count = #{pro_count}, order_result = #{order_result}, order_status=#{order_status} where order_num = #{order_num}
mapper.select: select * from orders where id=#{id} order by order_num desc
select * from orders order by order_num desc
